mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry (member_id, type_id, title, content, is_public, is_answered, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{typeId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{isPublic}, #{isAnswered}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT i.inquiry_id AS inquiryId, i.member_id AS memberId, i.type_id AS typeId, t.type_name AS typeName, i.title, i.content, i.is_public AS isPublic, i.is_answered AS isAnswered, i.created_at AS createdAt, i.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM inquiry i JOIN inquiry_type t ON i.type_id = t.type_id ORDER BY i.inquiry_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT i.inquiry_id AS inquiryId, i.member_id AS memberId, i.type_id AS typeId, t.type_name AS typeName, i.title, i.content, i.is_public AS isPublic, i.is_answered AS isAnswered, i.created_at AS createdAt, i.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM inquiry i JOIN inquiry_type t ON i.type_id = t.type_id WHERE i.inquiry_id = #{inquiryId}
